price: 69. Dis : « Ceux qui inventent des mensonges au sujet d’Allah ne réussiront pas. »
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
